Parovoz is an hidden gem in Kiev, awesome cocktails, knowledgeable bartenders and nice atmosphere.. highly recommended.

review: Excellent place for cocktails in this American prohibition-era themed bar. Enter through the cinema and head left. Highly recommended.

review: Very loft and cozy place, you get the atmosphere of a luxury train compartment from early 1900s. Bar is outstanding, kitchen is very nice, staff is exceptionally friendly and helpful. Inevitably, prices are quite high, but this place is a definite must visit.

review: Pretty hard to find which made it fun. The drinks were strong and good, but as a foreigner, I didn‚Äôt really feel welcomed there.
